nodes.title: Open Source Collaboration Platform for developers
nodes.summary: A self-hosted Slack-alternative, flexible, messaging platform

product.summary: A self-hosted Slack-alternative, flexible, messaging platform
The ultimate Free Open Source Solution for team communications
A self-hosted Slack-alternative, flexible, messaging platform
A professional project management software, covering the core process of software development projects

overview.overview: Mattermost is a self-hosted Slack-alternative, flexible, messaging platform that enables secure team collaboration.

highlights: Pre-configured, one-click to deploy on Cloud Servver
All codes on your server, secure and customizable
Paid image, free professional support for your business

childMarkdownRemark.html: This is a repackaged Mattermost with professional support for your business. Mattermost is a self-hosted Slack-alternative, flexible, messaging platform that enables secure team collaboration. It is designed to increase the agility, efficiency and innovation in high trust organizations while keeping data and operations under IT control.
